full_text: Pattern is free with ads on the website* Get ready to bust your stash in style with the Pixel Pop Knit Hat — a bold and modern beanie that turns simple slipped stitches into color-packed goodness! Designed with mosaic knitting (yep, that’s just one color per round!), this project is perfect for knitters ready to play with colorwork without juggling multiple strands. Use two or more contrasting yarns from your stash and watch the pattern pop. Whether you’re knitting for yourself or whipping up gifts, Pixel Pop is a satisfying, stash-busting make that works up fast and looks fantastic on everyone.
